code: import React from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import UserService from'../service/UserService';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Navbar(){var isAuthenticated=UserService.isAuthenticated();const navigate=useNavigate();const handleLogout=()=>{const confirmDelete=window.confirm('Are you sure you want to logout this user?');if(confirmDelete){UserService.logout();isAuthenticated=0;if(!isAuthenticated){navigate("/");}}};const handleclick1=()=>{if(isAuthenticated===true){navigate('/profile');}else{alert("Please login");}};const handleclick2=()=>{if(isAuthenticated===true){navigate('/user-management');}else{alert("Please login");}};const handleclick3=()=>{navigate('/home');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleclick3,children:"Home"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleclick1,children:"Profile"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleclick2,children:"User Management"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleLogout,children:"Logout"})})]})});}export default Navbar;
